name: Avohass Kenya Extra Virgin Avocado Oil 16.9 fl oz Bottle
short_description: EXTRA VIRGIN AVOCADO OIL, FIRST COLD PRESSED, UNREFINED: Avohass Extra Virgin Avocado Oil is made with 35-40 premium Grade A avocados that are freshly picked at the peak of ripeness and immediately cold pressed for high quality and a rich flavor. Avohass is vibrant green in color with a slightly nutty, rich, and buttery avocado flavor.

MINIMAL PROCESSING: Extra Virgin quality avocado oil implies that only premium, unbruised, perfectly ripe fruit can be used. No heat, chemicals or solvents are used keeping vitamins and nutrients intact for a nutrient dense oil. Extra Virgin is always “Unrefined” and “First Cold Pressed”.

NON GMO PROJECT VERIFIED & CERTIFIED KOSHER: Our Extra Virgin Avocado Oil is Paleo & Whole30 compliant and naturally gluten free, dairy free, cholesterol free and packed with heart healthy high monounsaturated fats.

HIGH SMOKE POINT: Avohass Extra Virgin Avocado Oil is not only ideal for all your high heat cooking like grilling , roasting and frying, but is also so rich and buttery in flavor, that it makes the perfect addition to all your salad dressings, dips, sauces and marinades. ”From Drizzle To Sizzle”

name: Organic Avocado Oil Unrefined Virgin, 100% Pure & Natural, Cold Pressed, Moisturizing for Skin Care, Massage, Hair Growth, and to Dilute Essential Oils, Carrier Oil For Aromatherapy 4oz
short_description: 100% PURE & NATURAL COLD-PRESS AVOCADO CARRIER OIL: What sets White Naturals Organic Carrier Oils apart is their unparalleled purity and concentration. Natural, with no adulterants or dilution, our oils provide the maximum benefit

USE IT AS CARRIER OIL: Incorporate Avocado Oil into your daily routines, whether it’s for skincare, haircare, or massage therapy. Dilute your favorite cleansing or relaxing essential oil with our Avocado carrier oil to use as a facial cleansing, a pre-shampoo hair treatment for thicker, shinier hair, or as a massage oil to help relax tired and sore body muscles.

INTENSE MOISTURIZING: Avocado carrier oil is renowned for its ability to hydrate your skin and hair deeply. It's like a long drink of water for your dry or thirsty skin and locks, leaving them feeling soft, supple, and well-nourished.

NATURAL ANTI AGING: Packed with powerful antioxidants, this oil is your natural defense against the signs of aging. Those antioxidants work to combat free radicals, which are responsible for fine lines and wrinkles. Regular use can help maintain a youthful, radiant appearance.
MASSAGE OIL FOR MASSAGE THERAPY – Our therapeutic-grade massage oil is great for aromatherapy massage, foot massage, back massage, and neck massage as it is gentle and fast absorbing on the skin.
LIGHTWEIGHT & SILKY – A smooth, easy-to-use oil that feels soft on the skin and blends effortlessly with other oils and creams.

name: Kevala Avocado Oil – Cold Pressed | Non‑GMO Project Verified & Kosher | Multipurpose for High Smoke Point Cooking, Roasting, Sautéing & Skin Moisturizing – Ideal Kitchen Staple – 128 Fl Oz (Pack of 1)
short_description: [ PURE COLD PRESSED ] – Cold pressed from select avocados without hexane or solvents; minimally processed to help retain natural properties; ideal for those seeking a clean oil for everyday use.
[ NON‑GMO & KOSHER CERTIFIED ] – Non‑GMO Project Verified and Kosher certified; supports diverse dietary needs with reliable sourcing and consistent quality in every bottle.
[ HIGH SMOKE POINT & MULTIPURPOSE ] – Refined for high smoke point cooking; suitable for frying, roasting, sautéing, or grilling; performs well under heat without overpowering flavour.
[ VERSATILE EVERYDAY OIL ] – A mild, neutral-tasting oil made for salad dressings, baking, or finishing touches; suitable for paleo, keto, and Whole30-style meals; a true kitchen staple.
[ SKINCARE & BEAUTY USAGE ] – Lightweight texture makes it ideal as a skin moisturiser or carrier oil; commonly used in massage and DIY beauty blends; contains naturally occurring antioxidants.

short_description: A Very Versatile Oil: Kevala avocado oil is a versatile vegan oil for cooking, perfect for sautéing, baking, and frying without compromising any flavor.
High Smoke Point: With a high smoke point, our avocado oil is ideal for high-heat cooking, maintaining nutrients and taste in your favorite different dishes.
Made with Fresh Avocados: Elevate your meals with a unique flavor and health benefits with our cooking oil made from select premium and fresh avocados.
Works with Many Recipes: You can toss your favorite veggies in avocado oil for a flavorful side dish, drizzle it over cooked pasta, or mix it in a salad dressing!
For your Hair Care Routine: Packed with vitamins and many other benefits, Kevala avocado oil can also be an amazing addition to your hair care routine.

name: Handcraft Blends Avocado Oil - Cold-Pressed 16 Fl Oz - 100% Pure and Natural - Premium Grade Carrier Oil for Skin and Hair - Hair and Body - Massage - Hexane-Free
short_description: 100% PURE & NATURAL AVOCADO OIL unfiltered, undiluted without any additives or fillers. Rich in vitamins and fatty acids it is truly a wonder carrier oil. Avocado Oil can be used for skin care, aromatherapy, hair, natural lubricant, moisturizer, and much more.

AVOCADO OIL FOR HAIR is loved by many people around the world for their hair care. Vitamin E and other nutrients may help maintain healthy hair. Perfect for gorgeous shiny hair without any greasiness, it also softens your hair, making it more manageable and easily combed.

NATURAL SKIN MOISTURIZER Combine Moisturizing Avocado Oil with other essential oils and massage the mixture into your skin after a bath. Pat the skin dry with a towel, then massage in the avocado oil mixture. Avocado oil is also effective on its own and can be applied all over the body to keep your skin soft and smooth.

AROMATHERAPY WITH AVOCADO CARRIER OIL Essential Oil Aromatherapy requires a Carrier Oil such as Avocado Oil, Coconut Oil, Castor Oil, Sweet Almond Oil, Grapeseed Oil, etc.. Since essential oils are so potent, they must be diluted before being applied to the skin. Combine different oils to find your favorite scent!
MOISTURIZING SKIN OIL When left on for short periods of time and rinsed off with warm water, avocado oil for skin can keep skin hydrated without leaving an oily residue.

name: AVA JANE'S KITCHEN - Extra Virgin Avocado Oil - 100% Cold Pressed, Natural, & Unrefined - 480°F High Smoke Point, Rich in Potassium & Vitamins - Creamy & Buttery Taste - 2 Bottle Pack, 8.4 fl oz each
short_description: Unrefined, Natural, and Cold Pressed Avocado Oil for Cooking: Ava Jane's Kitchen oil is sourced from the Guzman family orchard in Mexico, unlike supermarket brands, which are often diluted with vegetable oils. Hand-picked by skilled harvesters, our avocados are carefully processed to extract the rich, green flesh while leaving behind the skin and pit. This advanced method preserves all the natural vitamins and minerals, resulting in an incredibly smooth, buttery oil bursting with flavor.

Unrefined Avocado Oil's Health Benefits: Packed with nourishing monounsaturated fats, vitamin E, and antioxidants, Ava Jane's Kitchen's 100% pure avocado oil is a heart-healthy choice that complements a balanced diet, supporting heart wellness and promoting gut health. These nutrients are vital for your body and help enhance both physical vitality and radiant skin.

Makes Everything Taste Better, Just Like Real Butter: The absence of additives in Ava Jane's Kitchen Extra Virgin Avocado Oil allows it to bring out the rich, authentic taste of your dishes, providing a delightful experience in every bite. Perfect for enhancing the flavor of salads, roasted vegetables, and marinades, this high smoke point cooking oil is incredibly healthy, adding both flavor and nutrition to your meals!

Thoughtfully Packed for Freshness and Flavor: The avocado oil glass bottle from Ava Jane's Kitchen is designed in dark green to protect the oil from light, preserving its vibrant hue and natural taste. For maximum freshness, store it in a cool, dark spot and make sure it is sealed tightly. This helps you enjoy the pure, fresh taste that enhances your cooking with every use.

A Company Built on Family Trust, and a Love For Delicious Food: Ava Jane's Kitchen's mission is to bring the tastiest foods on planet earth to kitchens everywhere. This pure avocado oil for cooking is one of Ava Jane's Kitchen's favorites, and the team is proud to bring its deliciousness to you and your family.
